Text:
Hey, Kegir. Do you can to rip the subtitles in srt? Please, man. I ask this because i'm from Brazil, and sometimes translated the movies of Freakyflicks, and i need of subtitle in srt.

Please, answer.
Thank's.

@ Shenmue_GdA

The film is in English and the subs are in german. If you want srt subtitles in German it is to be found on  
http://www.opensubtitles.org
I forgot to mention that and I have not seen the rip Wootletootle. Just checked that it was ok. Saw the film 15 years ago in the Cinema. I highly recommend the film.
